#Australia

```{r map1}
shp_path <- system.file("data","sa2_2011.Rda", package = "sugaRbag")
load(system.file("data","capital_cities.Rda", package = "sugaRbag"))

# debug(create_buffer)
# debug(find_lat_group)
hexmap1 <- create_hexmap(shp_path = shp_path, buffer_dist = NULL,hex_size = .1, export_shp = FALSE, focal_points = capital_cities)
```

```{r}
ggplot(hexmap1 %>% filter(focal_point=="Hobart")) + geom_hex(aes(x = hex_long, y = hex_lat), stat = "identity")
```



```{r}
hexmap07 <- create_hexmap(shp_path = shp_path, buffer_dist = NULL,
hex_size = .07, export_shp = FALSE, focal_points = capital_cities)

ggplot(hexmap07 %>% filter(focal_point=="Hobart")) + geom_hex(aes(x = hex_long, y = hex_lat), stat = "identity")
```





```{r}
hexmap25 <- create_hexmap(shp_path = shp_path, buffer_dist = NULL,
